description: Abbreviation of "Although failed, it is still very glorious".

examples.chinese: 虽然最后失手了,但虽败犹荣
examples.translation: Although failed in the end, it was a glorious defeat

examples.chinese: 虽败犹荣,他们也积累了经验
examples.translation: Glorious defeat, they also accumulated experience

examples.chinese: 今晚的比赛真的打得非常精彩,虽败犹荣啊
examples.translation: Tonight's game was played wonderfully, a glorious defeat
